Title: Establishes expedited eviction proceedings for residential dwellings in which the owner and a lodger reside in the same dwelling
Summary: Establishes expedited eviction proceedings for a lodger in a residential dwelling in which the owner and lodger reside in the same dwelling.
LawSection: Real Property Actions and Proceedings Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property actions and proceedings law, in relation to establishing expedited eviction proceedings for residential dwellings in which the owner and a lodger reside in the same dwelling
